A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It was alright. I felt during the whole movie something was missing. I was waiting for something really exciting to happen\, and there were very few exciting parts.  Humor felt forced in the film.  I enjoyed the development of the new characters.  I was not satisfied with what they did or portrayed Luke Skywalker.  Rey was absolutely boring during the film and felt she was not challenged at all and not worthy of being the future of the jedi films. I really think the director just missed it on this one\, and the story itself seemed to go no where.
